exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.description: A basic upper body exercise performed in a prone position.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Start in a plank position. 2. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. 3. Push yourself back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the lower body muscles.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. 2. Lower your body as if you were sitting back into a chair. 3. Keep your chest upright and knees behind your toes. 4. Push through your heels to return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: A weight training exercise in which a loaded barbell or bar is lifted off the ground to the level of the hips, then lowered to the ground.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, toes pointing forward. 2. Bend at the hips and knees, keeping your back flat and chest up. 3. Grasp the barbell with hands shoulder-width apart. 4. Push through your heels to lift the bar, keeping it close to your body. 5. Extend your hips and knees to stand up straight. 6. Lower the barbell by bending at the hips and knees, keeping it close to your body.
exercises.target_muscles: Lower back, glutes, hamstrings, quadriceps, traps

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: A weight training exercise in which a barbell is pressed upwards from a supine position.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Lie flat on a bench, feet planted on the ground. 2. Grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. 3. Lower the barbell to your chest, keeping elbows at a 45-degree angle. 4. Push the barbell upward until arms are fully extended. 5. Lower the barbell back down to chest level and repeat.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: An upper body compound pulling exercise.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Grip the pull-up bar with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart, palms facing away from you. 2. Hang freely with arms fully extended. 3. Pull your body up until your chin clears the bar. 4. Lower your body until arms are fully extended and repeat.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lunges
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and calves.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells at your sides. 2. Take a large step forward with one leg, lowering your body until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle. 3. Push through your front heel to return to the starting position. 4. Repeat with the opposite leg.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: An abdominal exercise that also engages the obliques.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Sit on the ground with knees bent and feet lifted off the floor. 2. Lean back slightly and hold a weight or medicine ball with both hands. 3. Rotate your torso to the right, bringing the weight towards the ground beside your hip. 4. Return to the center and then rotate to the left, repeating the movement.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: An isometric core exercise that targets multiple muscle groups.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Start in a push-up position with arms extended. 2. Engage your core and hold your body in a straight line from head to heels. 3. Keep your shoulders, hips, and ankles aligned. 4. Hold the position for the desired amount of time.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A resistance training exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Sit on the leg press machine with your back against the pad and feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. 2. Release the safety bars and extend your legs, pushing the platform away from your body. 3. Bend your knees and lower the platform towards your chest. 4. Push the platform back up to the starting position and repeat.

exercises.name: Barbell Rows
exercises.description: A compound back exercise that targets the lats, rhomboids, and traps.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, knees slightly bent, and grip a barbell with hands shoulder-width apart, palms facing down. 2. Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back flat and chest up. 3. Pull the barbell towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. 4. Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An upper body exercise that targets the shoulders and triceps.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Sit on a bench with back support, holding dumbbells at shoulder height with palms facing forward. 2. Press the dumbbells upward until arms are fully extended. 3. Lower the dumbbells back down to shoulder height and repeat.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps brachii.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding dumbbells at arm length by your sides, palms facing forward. 2. Curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows close to your body. 3. Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position and repeat.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the triceps brachii.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Sit on the edge of a bench with hands placed beside your hips, fingers pointing forward. 2. Lift your hips off the bench and walk

exercises.name: Hamstring Curls
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the hamstring muscles.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Lie face down on a leg curl machine, with your knees positioned just off the end of the bench and your ankles under the padded lever. 2. Grasp the handles for stability and exhale as you curl your heels toward your glutes, keeping your hips flat on the bench. 3. Hold the contraction briefly, then inhale as you slowly lower the weight back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Chest Flyes
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that primarily targets the chest muscles.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Lie on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inward. 2. Extend your arms directly above your chest, slightly bent at the elbows. 3. Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest. 4. Exhale as you squeeze your chest to bring the dumbbells back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the calf muscles.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand by your sides or a barbell across your upper back. 2. Lift your heels off the ground as high as possible by pushing through the balls of your feet. 3. Hold the top position briefly, then lower your heels back down to the starting position.

exercises.name: Reverse Crunches
exercises.description: An abdominal exercise targeting the lower abs.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Lie on your back with your arms by your sides and palms facing down. 2. Lift your legs off the ground, bending your knees at a 90-degree angle. 3. Exhale as you contract your lower abs to lift your hips off the ground, bringing your knees towards your chest. 4. Inhale as you lower your legs back down to the starting position.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Rows
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the back muscles.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Sit at a cable row machine with your feet flat on the footplates and knees slightly bent. 2. Grasp the handle with an overhand grip, arms extended in front of you. 3. Pull the handle towards your lower chest while keeping your back straight and shoulders down. 4. Slowly return to the starting position, fully extending your arms.

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: An isolation exercise targeting the front deltoids.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding dumbbells in front of your thighs with palms facing your body. 2. Keeping your arms straight, raise the dumbbells directly in front of you until they reach shoulder height. 3. Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position with control.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.description: An isolation exercise targeting the quadriceps muscles.
exercises.execution_steps: 1. Sit on a leg extension machine with your back against the backrest and feet under the footpads. 2. Grab the handles on the sides of the seat for stability. 3. Extend your legs until they are straight, lifting the weight by contracting your quadriceps. 4. Slowly lower the weight back to the starting position.
